exercise.title: This is the title: Exercise 1
exercise.sentence:
__________ your credit card in the machine here.

I need to switch __________ my mobile phone.
over down off

I can't use my mobile phone. The __________ is low.
battery connection screen

You can't __________ on to the Internet without a username.
put switch log

Click on the
start menu. begin menu. go menu.

I want to recharge my
website. PC. laptop.

Now key __________ your password.
on in to

I can't get a
wireless connect. wireless connection. connection wireless.

I __________ work on Saturdays.
always at all times every time

In the afternoon,
rarely I take breaks. I rarely take breaks. I take rarely breaks.

They are here at 9 a.m and
they are never late. they never are late. never they are late.

I work in London but I also __________ work in Manchester.
sometimes some time sometime

Do you __________ work here?
usual use usually

__________ do the robots work for?
Where How Who

__________ often do the workers take a day off?

When do you stop work?
At the photocopier. At 5 p.m. At home.

How often do you take a day off?
Every time. Some time. Never.

You need to enter the password with __________ case letters.
small lower little

Can you __________ me a hand?
give make do

I'm trying
key in my password. of key in my password. to key in my password.

How do I use the new Intranet?
First of all, click here. The first, click here. At first, click here.

Do you want some help?
That would be good. That is good. That would good.

Can you help me?
It's sure. Sure. I'm sure.

I don't know
how log out. how to log out. log out.
